titleStmt.title: Spirituall wickednesse, in heavenly places, proclayming freedome to the forme, but persecuting the power: or an answer to a booke intituled, Freedom of religious worship: or, the jubilee of ordinances set forth without a name.
titleStmt.author: Naylor, James, 1617?-1660.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
